reviewText: Nice girls ( no nudity ) drags on.
It was not as good as it's better known competitor for sexy looking scenes with the women. It featured too much of what I didn't buy it for, including the Maxim mansion.

Victoria's Secret Fashion Show should be released on DVD and Blu ray as more people would enjoy their show. Natasha Malte who is featured in this DVD, later became Typhoid Mary from the Marvel Comics ELEKTRA movie and played BLOODRAYNE in 2 sequels. Natasha Malte also reminds me of Kristin Kreuk.

I own several DVDs that star sexy Natassia Malthe from Norway, so I wanted this one I saw at "amazon.com". I think she is 1/2 Chinese, and I love that. I was very excited to see her in a T-back in this DVD, so it wasn't disappointing. There are several attractive girls on it, but Natassia is by far my favorite. Her scenes in a T-back in this DVD and her nude scene in "Bloodrayne: The Third Reich" are ones I watch once or twice a week lately. My girlfriend now is from Japan, so I love Asian and Eurasian girls. After I watched this DVD the first time, I had sexy dreams about Natassia several nights.

This is one hot DVD. Maxim UK have been producing similar DVDs for years, but this one is def better! They should do reviews of other DVDs like Maxim UK does .. I bought all the DVDs they reviewed .. Hip Hop Honeys, and even better is Wild Girls: Thailand!! the last one is a must see! Amazon's got it!

Not bad. The women are stunning, but there's too much talk in between the features. I did like the interviews with the models, especially the "have you ever kissed a girl?" question. I'd buy it again, but the Sports Illustrated DVDs are still better.
A decent DVD with beautiful girls and a good picture quality, even if not a level of the DVDs of Sports Illustrated swimsuit.

This is Maxim's first foray into the DVD market. A strong DVD in this genre. The girls are great, very hot. Good extras and apparently Region Free! Could certainly use less commentary from the Maxim staff, but all-in-all a very watchable DVD for what it is.
